name: Thyme for Simurgh
description:
You are the apprentice for Dr Fronkensteen tasked with your final task before being allowed to work on reanimating humans.

If you can build and reanimate the mythical being Simurgh, you have passed the test.

How to play:

  • Drag and Drop - you only need your mouse!

Goal:

  • Try and assemble mythical Simurgh!
